body: Yeah but I wish the fmc was more apologetic in her possessiveness, I mean she gave in and chose to fuck the gaurds then got off on it in front of the mc; there ought to be more guilt there.
I'd rather have a possessive girlfriend rather than a slut (as if I'd even get a normal girlfriend)
10/10 would fap again
The fmc kinda reminds me with that slut sensei from Deadtube, but way less slutty & way more possessive here...
That's an ending i can get behind.
Though entertaining indeed stimulates. *sighs*
I will start punching the guard if i was him.
Kinda wanted a story where the raped ntr girl goes yandere and keeps the guy she was with together and ditches the ntr dude, this was close

good but the ending it's not enough.. the focus only to policewomen get tortured. I mean come on guys.. policeman need to torture by the boys and girls, get punch or whatever, only one page in chapter 5 (page 15).

But idk if the raping part to the police girls was like necessary, the ones that needed some kind of torture were the Police mens, i'm a little angry 'cause they didn't had what they deserve. But talking 'bout the police womans maybe something a little bit less extreme in that part
The end was kinda good, I mean i thank the Artist that the girl wasn't just going on for the dicks forever like the normal NTR and they actually had a Happy ending. I'm happy 'cause of that.

Wow, who is writing paragraphs of nothing in a comment section of a hentai. It was a common power experiment but someone has to link it to real life and make it weird. There were also women that had a toxic nature too.

>give them power and they too will show signs of toxic masculinity
Lol. Shut up. You dont even know what toxic masculinity is

Idk if being raped was the right punishment. The last girl realised what an horrible thing she have done to her friend and excepted the punishment as rape. And the prisoner girls, they encouraged the guys to rape the guard girls. 
I still think rape is not a good punishment.

But i am very disappointed by the comment section. Just because of the anonymous nature we say what happened was good but i can't blame you as well, what they did to prisoners was horrible what they got for that was horrible so it seems like it was a equivalent exchange. I don't know how to say what i am thinking, in fact i am confused myself. I don't regret reading this doujin but i do regret reading the comments. You would say "if you want to analyse this experiment then go read the real experiment" but what can i do i was horny and i want to survive NNN atleast once. And after reading this i am sure i will not come back for atleast 3 days

Comment section is the worst. Just because we have the power of being anonymous we say anything. 

Girls were being raped and we say yes they deserve it, yes they deserve some kind of punishment but is getting raped a right punishment? Same goes for boys, they didn't show what they did to them but i think they got raped too.

Now the hentai. It was interesting and adding girls just extended the experiment. Who says girls are frail and care for everyone, give them power and they too will show signs of toxic masculinity.
But there was one positive I noticed it this, the one with highest power(the one who was managing everything, the one who went to take some rest) she gained a sence of responsibility at the end, she kept cool even after being backed into a corner.
The change in the girl from the couple was unexpected, idk if this kind of result was observed in the real one.

I have continued thus comment, if interested read the next one.
